name: explosionNoBlockDamage

description: Allows structure mobs to spawn in flat worlds

description: Customizable forceload chunk limit

validators: Must be between 0 and 2pi, or -1

name: honeySlime
description: Orange stained glass behaves like slime, but doesn't stick to it
extras: Only available for 1.14. in 1.15 use honey instead

name: hopperCounters
description: hoppers pointing to wool will count items passing through them
extras: Enables /counter command, and actions while placing red and green carpets on wool blocks
Use /counter <color?> reset to reset the counter, and /counter <color?> to query
In survival, place green carpet on same color wool to query, red to reset the counters
Counters are global and shared between players, 16 channels available
Items counted are destroyed, count up to one stack per tick per hopper
validators: It has an accompanying command

name: horseWanderingFix
description: Prevents horses and other mobs to wander into the distance after dismounting
extras: Fixes issues with various Joergens wandering off and disappearing client-side

name: huskSpawningInTemples
description: Only husks spawn in desert temples

name: interactionUpdates
description: placing blocks cause block updates

name: kelpGenerationGrowthLimit
description: limits growth limit of newly naturally generated kelp to this amount of blocks
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 25. 25 and all natural kelp can grow 25 blocks, choose 0 to make all generated kelp not to grow

name: lagFreeSpawning
description: Spawning requires much less CPU and Memory

name: leadFix
description: Fixes leads breaking/becoming invisible in unloaded chunks
extras: You may still get visibly broken leash links on the client side, but server side the link is still there.

name: maxEntityCollisions
description: Customizable maximal entity collision limits, 0 for no limits
validators: Must be a positive number

name: mergeTNT
description: Merges stationary primed TNT entities

name: missingTools

name: creativeFlyDrag
description: Creative air drag
extras: Increased drag will slow down your flight
So need to adjust speed accordingly
With 1.0 drag, using speed of 11 seems to matching vanilla speeds.
Purely client side setting, meaning that
having it set on the decicated server has no effect
but this also means it will work on vanilla servers as well

Its a client command so can be issued when connecting to non-carpet servers. In client-server setting it will only affect the executing player, so each player needs to type it separately for the desired effect

name: optimizedPoweredRails

name: maxHostileSpawnLightLevel
description: Adjusts the maximum light level general hostile mobs can spawn in
extras: When maxHostileSpawnLightLevel < 7, block light level is used to determine whether the position is considered "dark" or not, while leaving spawn chances at and below the maximum light level intact

When maxHostileSpawnLightLevel > 7, the upper bound of the random integer generator is increased in order to accommodate for higher light levels, thereby affecting mob spawning chances at light levels > 0 and <= 7, most likely increasing mob spawning chances over vanilla
validators: You must choose a light level from 0 to 15

name: phantomsCapped

name: teleportToPoiWithoutPortals

name: voidedLoyaltyTridentsReturn

name: maxHostileSpawnLightLevel
description: Adjusts the maximum light level general hostile mobs can spawn in
extras: At maxHostileSpawnLightLevel <= 7, only maximum block light level is modified without changing the light level spawning chances, emulating mob spawning chances from 1.17.1 and below

At every subsequent value maxHostileSpawnLightLevel > 7, the upper bound for the random integer generator is increased to accommodate for higher light levels, modifying the mob spawning chances at light levels > 0 and <= 7
validators: You must choose a light level from 0 to 15
